Sussex Party Band

Looking for a band for your party in Sussex? We're an upbeat, feel-good band that are ready to bring our foot-stomping live set to your party. We'll get your event-goer up on their feet and dancing all night long.

When Does Party Season Begin?

In Sussex, the party season is year-round. Throughout the Summer (when the weather is more... predictable) you'll find us playing beer gardens, BBQs and or one of the many beach-front venues in Eastbourne, Hastings or Brighton.

As the nights draw in, you'll find us playing in pubs and bars across sussex - preferably those with an open log fire.

The Great Fire

We''d love to find out more about your upcoming event and are currently booking for Summer and Autumn 2020.

  • Book The Band

The Best Live Bands in the Sussex

The music scene in Sussex and the South East of England is incredibly welcoming and supportive. We've put together a list of the other bands for hire from our local area that we admire - if you see any of these names on the bill, you should changes your plans and head to see them.

Joel White

  • Instagram
  • Website

Joel White is dynamic, musical and entertaining in equal measure. Soul, Blues, Jazz and Funk are the languages he most fluently speaks. He has the most incredible voice and makes even the most complex of musical arrangements look completely effortless.

The Normans

  • Facebook

The Normans are a 4-piece party tunes cover band based in the South East of England (Eastbourne and Folkestone). Always performing with infectious enthusiasm, they play well-known pop, dance, rock and indie songs from some of history's greatest and most well loved artists.

The Cavaliers

  • Facebook

Playing to some of the largest audiences in the South, are these the band to beat?

The Diamond Experience

  • Facebook

Fronted by Joel White (above), The Diamond Experience provide bespoke musical solutions for all events, weddings and private hires. Perhaps the most versatile collective of musicians we've ever worked with.

Booking Enquiry

Contact us for your wedding, party or event across the whole of Sussex, Kent, Surrey & London - or even further afield.
